page.title: 06A HOTEL'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: 0700 Early morning teas - unlock doors 0800 Work begins in the kitchen 0830 Breakfast - waitressing - washing-up - brewing tea - clear- ing tables - setting up tables for evening meal 1000 Stop for own breakfast 1015 Clean the rooms 1200 Chambermaiding (making beds) - any laundry work done - evening meal prepared - tidy-up and finish off in kitchen - clean and tidy the rooms 1230 Lunch served in bar 1400 A rest period (hopefully!) - answer doorbell and 'phone - people ringing for information & guests requiring tea - etc. compile orders for evening meals 1800 Open bar - cooking begins in kitchen - tables prepared in dining room
